name: Popover.Root
description: An overlay that displays additional information or options when triggered.
description_zh: An overlay that displays additional information or options when triggered.

autoFocus.description:
Whether to automatically set focus on the first focusable
content within the popover when opened.
autoFocus.description_zh:
是否自动将焦点设置在第一个可聚焦对象上
打开时弹出窗口中的内容。

closeOnEscape.description: Whether to close the popover when the escape key is pressed.
closeOnEscape.description_zh: 是否在按下 Esc 键时关闭弹出框。

closeOnInteractOutside.description: Whether to close the popover when the user clicks outside of the popover.
closeOnInteractOutside.description_zh: 当用户在弹出框外部单击时是否关闭弹出框。

defaultOpen.description:
The initial open state of the popover when it is first rendered.
Use when you do not need to control its open state.
defaultOpen.description_zh:
首次呈现弹出框时弹出框的初始打开状态。
在不需要控制其打开状态时使用。

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

ids.type:
Partial<{
  anchor: string
  trigger: string
  content: string
  title: string
  description: string
  closeTrigger: string
  positioner: string
  arrow: string
}>
ids.description: The ids of the elements in the popover. Useful for composition.
ids.description_zh: 弹出窗口中元素的 ID。对合成很有用。

initialFocusEl.description: The element to focus on when the popover is opened.
initialFocusEl.description_zh: 打开弹出框时要关注的元素。

modal.description:
Whether the popover should be modal. When set to `true`:
- interaction with outside elements will be disabled
- only popover content will be visible to screen readers
- scrolling is blocked
- focus is trapped within the popover
modal.description_zh:
弹出窗口是否应为模态。当设置为 'true' 时：
- 将禁用与外部元素的交互
- 只有 PopOver 内容对屏幕阅读器可见
- 滚动被阻止
- 焦点被困在 Popover 内

persistentElements.description:
Returns the persistent elements that:
- should not have pointer-events disabled
- should not trigger the dismiss event
persistentElements.description_zh:
返回符合以下条件的持久元素：
- 不应禁用指针事件
- 不应触发 dismiss 事件

portalled.description:
Whether the popover is portalled. This will proxy the tabbing behavior regardless of the DOM position
of the popover content.
portalled.description_zh:
弹出窗口是否已门户。这将代理 Tab 键行为，而不管 DOM 位置如何
的弹出框内容。

positioning.description: The user provided options used to position the popover content
positioning.description_zh: 用户提供的用于定位弹出框内容的选项

events.name: escapeKeyDown
events.description: Function called when the escape key is pressed
events.description_zh: 按下 Esc 键时调用的函数

events.name: focusOutside
events.description: Function called when the focus is moved outside the component
events.description_zh: 当焦点移出组件时调用的函数

events.name: interactOutside
events.description: Function called when an interaction happens outside the component
events.description_zh: 当交互发生在组件外部时调用的函数

events.name: openChange
events.description: Function invoked when the popover opens or closes
events.description_zh: 弹出框打开或关闭时调用的函数

events.name: pointerDownOutside
events.description: Function called when the pointer is pressed down outside the component
events.description_zh: 在组件外部按下指针时调用的函数
